title: Revenue: Creating a Credit for a Customer
body:
Revenue: Creating a Credit for a Customer¶


  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Customers

  5. Click or search for the customer for whom you are creating the credit

  6. Click in the upper right hand corner

  7. Click Create Credit

  8. Click Choose a program

    • Select the program for which you are granting the credit

  9. Enter a description of the credit

  10. Enter the amount you want to grant for the credit

  11. Click Save
